tool_description: Access vital data for 30,000 different airports worldwide. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/airports.
name: Airports by API-Ninjas
title: Airports by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/airports
api_list.description: API Ninjas Airports API endpoint. At least one of the optional parameters must be provided.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: number of results to offset for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: administrative region such as state or province within a country (e.g. California)

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: airport country. Must be 2-character ISO-2 country code (e.g. GB)

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: airport name. This parameter supports partial matching (e.g. Heathrow will match London Heathrow Airport)

optional_parameters.name: icao
optional_parameters.description: International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) 4-character airport code.

optional_parameters.name: iata
optional_parameters.description: International Air Transport Association (IATA) 3-character airport code.
